JustExampleOfGapJuncPointProcessName.ppPtrName: Name of the POINTER in this gap junction point process to be connected with a variable in a distributed membrane mechanism
JustExampleOfGapJuncPointProcessName.dmVarNameWithIndex: Name of the variable in a distributed membrane mechanism to be connected with the POINTER in this gap junction point process; it can be either scalar (e.g. 'cai') or array element (e.g. 'ca_cadifus[1]')
